about_the_game:
TS-1095 is an exciting new open world, survival, building game that you can either enjoy solo or invite up to 3 friends to explore a beautiful tropical island complex and defend your safe haven!

Beta-Test build to be Delivered early December 2023
Application Process
Wishlist and Click the "Request Access" button in the Store Page


Beta-Test Features



Base Building

Build your base anywhere. The foundation system of TS-1095 let's you build literally anywhere you want, except in deep water! Will your base be a cliff stronghold, a dark cave base or a hilltop penthouse? You decide! You need it to keep yourself away from the sun, sleep, save your game, craft items, farm crops, store items and stay protected from all that lurk. With the modular building system, you can create your ideal shelter (or mansion, that's up to you) and give it your personal style with artifacts, trinkets and decorations you find scattered or hidden (deliberately???) all over this vast map.




Resource Gathering

Embark on a resource-rich adventure! Harvest trees, mine rocks, and gather valuable materials to fuel your survival, combat capabilities and constructions. Unleash your creativity and master the art of resource gathering in a vibrant, tropical environment.





Combat (Limited to Animal Enemies)

Hunt and be hunted! Explore the vast map of TS-1095 and hunt down seagulls, wild boars, and even sharks as you navigate the untamed wilderness. But beware, as you can become the hunted extremely fast. Can you outsmart these formidable foes and emerge victorious? Can you evade the supernatural evil that lurks these parts? The battle for survival begins now.




Water Bodies different behaviour/system

Take a nice raft-trip in the ocean, maybe even go for a short swim. That is the easy part in the ocean, but navigating back or diving deeper, that's when things take a rather unexpected turn. When it comes to shallow waters, like a pond, easy to see through, dive and fish in, right? Yes, but ponds are many a creature's home and they will defend it fiercely!





Cave Systems

Discover and explore the caves of TS-1095. Delve deep into them and uncover the secrets of those that came before, or use them as shelter from the elements and wilderness. Just keep in mind that these kind of havens seldom, if ever, are empty!




Beta-Test build to be Delivered early December 2023
Application Process
Wishlist and Click the "Request Access" button in the Store Page


Early Access Feature list:
  • All in Beta-Test plus...
  • Open World map of 12km x 12km
  • Singleplayer & Online Co-Op up to 4 players
  • Saving System (with Auto-Save)
  • Sleep System
  • First-Person and Third-Person Camera
  • Attributes System (Health-Stamina-Hunger-Thirst-Sunburn-Oxygen)
  • Player Conditions (Rested, Well-Rested Wet, Cold, Freezing, Bleeding, Sunburn, Sunsick, Broken Bone)
  • 13 Weapons
  • 8 Modular Armor pieces
  • 2 Arrow Types
  • 52 Modular Building Pieces
  • 17 Crafted Items
  • 6 Crafted Tools
  • 32 Crafting Materials
  • 6 Choppable Trees
  • 3 Minable Rocks
  • 4 Gatherable Plants
  • 2 Gatherable Rocks
  • 21 Animals
  • 1 Escape Way
  • Farming System
  • Sailing System
  • Day/Night Cycle
  • Weather System
  • Cooking System

Full Release Feature list:
  • All in Early Access plus...
  • New Player Conditions (Disoriented, Intoxicated, Poisoned, Homesick, Terrified, Enraged)
  • 22 New Weapons
  • 24 New Modular Armor pieces
  • 4 New Arrow Types
  • 106 New Modular Building Pieces
  • 46 New Crafted Items
  • 9 New Crafted Tools
  • 46 New Crafting Materials
  • 11 New Choppable Trees
  • 6 New Minable Rocks
  • 9 New Gatherable Plants
  • 5 New Gatherable Rocks
  • 18 New Animals
  • 2 New Escape Ways
  • Vehicle System
  • Seasons System (Winter, Spring, Summer, Fall)
  • ...still adding to the list!

short_description: This is an Open World Survival Craft and Building game! Build your base, Craft items, Endure the elements, Survive and Thrive in a lush open world full with untamed places and animals. Enjoy solo or team up with friends in a thrilling online co-op experience for up to 4 players! Welcome to Tropica!
